result.execSummary:
The defendant Peter C. Hall was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Fail/Report to County Jail (<10 Days), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.425(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.dispoDesc: State moves to amend ct#1 to Fail to report <10 days 946.425(1m)(a), court so orders, DEF pleads NC to amended charge found guilty, Court sentences DEF to 60 days county jail with huber  report to jail 7-18-14 at 3pm credit for 13 days ;   courts costs $443.00  apply bond to costs
judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: Defendant Peter C. Hall in court with attorney James C McLaughlin.  John M Yackel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts State moves to amend ct#1 to Fail to report <10 days 946.425(1m)(a), court so orders, DEF pleads NC to amended charge found guilty, Court sentences DEF to 60 days county jail with huber  report to jail 7-18-14 at 3pm credit for 13 days ;   courts costs $443.00  apply bond to costs

Defendant Peter C. Hall in court with attorney James C McLaughlin.  Defendant Peter C. Hall in custody.  John M Yackel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. DE is advised of rights to prelim; DE waives right to prelim. Court finds PC and binds DE over for trial.  Arraignment scheduled for July 1, 2014 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Peter C. Hall in court with attorney James C McLaughlin.  Defendant Peter C. Hall in custody appearing by video.  John M Yackel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DEF counsel requests bond reduction.  State objects reduction.  Court denies request.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 29, 2014 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Peter C. Hall in court, in custody by video.  Bruce R Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Acknowledges receipt of complaint; waives reading of complaint; advised of rights/penalties; advised of right to prelim. Adjourned for matter of atty. & prelim. Court advises DE to contact PD's office.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 22, 2014 at 02:30 pm.
